comments.author: nightsoul.blackps@googlemail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

Go to page , http://www.zimbio.com/100+Best+Bikini+Bodies/articles/YteIuO1-W_k/Audrina+Patridge and try to copy Audrina Patridge
 and then in another browser,firefox can't even copy a text from a page anymore?

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Go to http://www.zimbio.com/100+Best+Bikini+Bodies/articles/YteIuO1-W_k/Audrina+Patridge
2.Try to copy the name http://www.zimbio.com/100+Best+Bikini+Bodies/articles/YteIuO1-W_k/Audrina+Patridge
3.

Actual Results:  
You can't copy a text from the page.

Expected Results:  
To copy the text without any problem.

comments.author: mozilla@ahlblom.eu
comments.text:
Does the issue still occur if you start Firefox in Safe Mode?
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

How about with a new, empty profile?
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Basic+Troubleshooting#w_8-make-a-new-profile

Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110508 Firefox/6.0a1
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686 on x86_64; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110508 Firefox/6.0a1

comments.author: mozilla@ahlblom.eu
bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.text: The margins of the #nav are on top of the text.  And they're transparent to painting but not to events.  See also bug 102695 (of which this might just be a duplicate).
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.raw_text: The margins of the #nav are on top of the text.  And they're transparent to painting but not to events.  See also bug 102695 (of which this might just be a duplicate).
